about.message: Hii, my name is Candice Keet and I'm an aspiring full-stack developer.

education.description: I matriculated from Garlandale High with a bachelor's pass. My  subjects were English, Afrikaans, Life Orientation, Math, Economics, Business Studies and Tourism.

Through Life Choices I'm currently learning the skills needed to become a full-stack developer. So far the journey has been tough but being here at the academy has taught me many things and I'm open to learning more.

testimonials.name: Caitlin Dalwai
testimonials.message: During my time at Life Choices Academy so far, Candice has been one of the best parts. Candice is a dedicated student and is always going the extra mile. She can speak to literally anyone and become their friend which is a great skill to have when it comes to networking and gaining more knowledge and resources from others. Candice is never shy to help which emphasizes how great of a team player she is. Any company would be lucky to have her.

testimonials.name: Masoodah Geoerge
testimonials.message: It is in my best interest to write a testimonial for Candice. Her enthusiastic character and infectious positivity makes anyone feel special. Not only is she a lovely person, she is an excellent listener and expresses herself very well. Her personality reflects in everything she does, including her work. If you ask me, Candice is more than the perfect candidate

testimonials.name: Nikilitha Kakaza
testimonials.message: Candice brings positivity to the workplace. Even during tough times, she maintains an optimistic outlook, motivating others and creating a pleasant atmosphere. Candice approaches challenges with ingenuity. She thinks outside the box, propose innovative solutions, and adapt well to unexpected situations. Her creativity adds value to the team.

testimonials.name: Olwethu Malumla
testimonials.message: I feel fortunate to have had the opportunity to learn alongside Candice Keet, and I have no doubt that they will go on to achieve great things.Her positive energy is contagious, and she has a way of making everyone feel included and valued. If you have the chance to work with or learn from Candice, consider yourself lucky she is a true asset to any team or community!
